name: Trieve
headline: All-in-one API for search, RAG, & recommendations
description:
Infrastructure for search teams building retrieval and RAG. Trieve combines search language models with tools for tuning ranking and relevance.

Building excellent search is difficult and can take months to implement then even more time to maintain. Trieve offers production-ready infrastructure that works out of the box to help search teams build adjustable AI search and RAG into their products. With tools for custom models, relevancy weighting, date-recency biasing, semantic full-text hybrid search, recommendations, and more Trieve covers the full spectrum of what a team wants from their discovery infrastructure.
tags: industry:developer-tools; industry:open-source; industry:api; industry:search; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Nicholas Khami, Founder
founders.description: Find me at https://github.com/skeptrunedev . My primary hobbies are reading progression fantasy, riding motorcycles, and running.

#  AI search for the modern world 
We help companies build unfair competitive advantages through their discovery experiences 
[Get Started Free](https://trieve.ai/<https:/dashboard.trieve.ai>)
[Request a demo](https://trieve.ai/</request-demo>)
Search AI Chat Recommendations Analytics API
[ ![Search](https://cdn.trieve.ai/landing-tabs/dark-mode-docsearch.webp) ![Search](https://cdn.trieve.ai/landing-tabs/light-mode-docsearch.webp) ](https://trieve.ai/<https:/trieve.ai/request-demo>)[ ![AI Chat](https://cdn.trieve.ai/landing-tabs/dark-mode-aichat.webp) ![AI Chat](https://cdn.trieve.ai/landing-tabs/light-mode-aichat.webp) ](https://trieve.ai/<https:/trieve.ai/request-demo>)[ ![Recommendations](https://cdn.trieve.ai/landing-tabs/recommendations.webp) ![Recommendations](https://cdn.trieve.ai/landing-tabs/recommendations.webp) ](https://trieve.ai/<https:/trieve.ai/request-demo>)[ ![Analytics](https://cdn.trieve.ai/landing-tabs/hn-search-analytics.webp) ![Analytics](https://cdn.trieve.ai/landing-tabs/hn-search-analytics.webp) ](https://trieve.ai/<https:/trieve.ai/request-demo>)[ ![API](https://cdn.trieve.ai/landing-tabs/dark-api.webp) ![API](https://cdn.trieve.ai/landing-tabs/light-api.webp) ](https://trieve.ai/<https:/docs.trieve.ai/api-reference>)
##  Powering 30,000+ discovery experiences across categories 
![](https://cdn.trieve.ai/customer-logos/mintlify-logo.svg)
![](https://cdn.trieve.ai/customer-logos/vapi-logo.png)
![](https://cdn.trieve.ai/customer-logos/guardant-health-logo.svg)
![](https://cdn.trieve.ai/customer-logos/bestway-logo.png)
![](https://cdn.trieve.ai/customer-logos/signoz-logo.svg)
![](https://cdn.trieve.ai/customer-logos/parcelhero.webp)
![](https://cdn.trieve.ai/customer-logos/billtrack50logo.svg)
![](https://cdn.trieve.ai/customer-logos/hostai-logo.webp)
![](https://cdn.trieve.ai/customer-logos/openmart-logo.svg)
![](https://cdn.trieve.ai/customer-logos/agentic-labs-logo.png)
End-to-end
## Trieve Coordinates, You Scale
Billion-scale search, discovery, and RAG experiences within the same API
### Semantic Vector Search
For when you need more than just full-text search. Trieve supports semantic vector search out of the box. 
### BM25 & SPLADE Full-Text Search
Choose between the leading state-of-the-art retrieval models for full-text search.
### Stock and Custom Embedding models
Our modular infrastructure offers several models and bring your own embedding model.
### Hybrid Search
Get the best of both worlds. Trieve supports hybrid search, combining full-text search and semantic vector search with cross-encoder re-ranker models.
### Merchandising & Relevance tuning
Tune and boost search results to hit your KPIs via the API or no-code dashboard.
### Sub-sentence Highlighting
Search results can get long. Sub-sentence highlights show users exactly what they are looking for, quick.
Build Fast and Don't Break Things
## Manage ingestion, embeddings and analytics with ease
### Built on the best foundations
We help companies build unfair competitive advantages through their search, discovery, and RAG experiences 
### Private Open-Source Models
We use open source embedding models and LLMs running in our own servers. Data is never leaked.
### Batteries Included
Our API surface covers chunking, ingestion, search, recommendations, RAG, and even a little front-end.
### Self-Hostable
Sensitive data? Need maximum performance? Host Trieve yourself with terraform templates and no external dependencies.
![Visual of Trieve features](https://cdn.trieve.ai/battery-4-square.png)
## Set up industry-leading search in 30 minutes
Step 1: Add Existing Data
Upload individual chunks or entire documents that get chunked by our algorithms via our API or no-code dashboard.
Step 2: Integrate our API
Add calls to our API on your create and update routes to keep your data current.
Step 3: Search, Recommend, or Generate
Test and tune search, recommendations, and chat quality with our search playground, then integrate the API calls into your product.
Ready!
![Steps to use](https://cdn.trieve.ai/db-4-square.png)
## Take control of your discovery.
AI-native, end-to-end, solution for the trends of today and tomorrow
[Get Started Free](https://trieve.ai/<https:/dashboard.trieve.ai>)
[Request a demo](https://trieve.ai/</request-demo>)

generated_description:
**Trieve: Simplifying AI-Powered Search**

Founded in 2023 and currently part of Y Combinator’s Batch W24, Trieve is a San Francisco-based startup on a mission to revolutionize the way search and recommendations are done. With a relatively small team of just 7 employees, Trieve is tackling one of the most complex problems in tech: building an effective search infrastructure.

At its core, Trieve serves as an all-in-one API designed for search, retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), and recommendations. Think of it as the ultimate toolkit for developers who want to integrate sophisticated search capabilities into their applications without the usual hassle. Historically, creating a robust search function could take months, but Trieve promises a production-ready solution that works right out of the box.

### What Sets Trieve Apart?

Trieve combines cutting-edge search language models with advanced tools that allow teams to fine-tune their search results. The features include:
- **Semantic Vector and Hybrid Search**: Out-of-the-box support for both semantic and full-text search.
- **Custom Models and Embedding Options**: A flexible infrastructure that allows for stock or custom embedding models.
- **Relevancy Tuning**: Fine-tune search results and boost performance via an API or a no-code dashboard.
- **Comprehensive Coverage**: From chunking data to providing analytics, Trieve covers all bases with its API.

This comprehensive approach lets teams manage everything from ingestion to analytics with ease. For those with stringent data requirements, Trieve even offers self-hosting capabilities.

### Use Cases and Applications

Today, Trieve is already powering over 30,000 discovery experiences across various sectors, including e-commerce and analytics. Companies leveraging Trieve can build a competitive edge by enhancing their search functionality and overall user experience.

### Why Choose Trieve?

If you want to set up industry-leading search capabilities in under 30 minutes, Trieve is your go-to solution. By simply uploading data, integrating the API, and tweaking search parameters, businesses can have a sophisticated search engine up and running without extensive downtime or ongoing maintenance burdens. 

In short, if search is a crucial component of your product, or if you’re committed to building an exceptional discovery experience, Trieve positions itself as a powerful partner. For a closer look at what Trieve can do, visit their website at [trieve.ai](https://trieve.ai) or request a demo to see the magic in action.
